alert.note: Alert for Bell; Clay; Harlan; Knox; Leslie; Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 1:28PM EDT until June 17 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Harlan County in southeastern Kentucky... Bell County in southeastern Kentucky... Central Knox County in southeastern Kentucky... Southwestern Leslie County in southeastern Kentucky... Southeastern Whitley County in south central Kentucky... Southeastern Clay County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 200 PM EDT. * At 128 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Ashers Fork to Wilkerson, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Barbourville, Harlan, Pineville, Middlesboro, Loyall, Evarts, Wallins Creek, Bobs Creek, Sandy Fork, Varilla, Swan Lake and Coldiron. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bell; Clay; Harlan; Knox; Leslie; Whitley
